ygData.subject: Re: Attack on the Ark
ygData.msgSnippet: ... She threw quills again at the preds just as the lazar fire came at her.  She transformed, but only in time to get hit.  She got hit in the back and fell.

::Spears/Shadow Wing:;

She threw quills again at the preds just as the lazar fire came at 
her.  She transformed, but only in time to get hit.  She got hit in 
the back and fell.  She got hit again in the leg and damaged it 
enough so she could barely walk with it.

Shadow Wing::
She stuffed the weapons into a cargo bin and ran to the entrance.  
She transformed into owl mode and took flight.  she chased Dark One 
and fireed her optic lazars at him.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, KSLawdogg@c... wrote:
> Hiss/Pyro/Breakdown/Scavenger/Dark One:
> 
> 
> 
> Hiss saw the grenade and leapt into the air, transforming to ray 
gun mode, 
> the shockwave of the plasma grenade sending him flying through the 
air.  
> Transforming to robot mode, he cupped his mouth, yelling towards 
Pyro.
> 
> "Pyro, get that worthless little whel----" he was interrupted as he 
slammed 
> into a rock.
> 
> ---
> 
> Pyro turned his cannon, firing off three fireballs at Rebelyell, 
not even 
> feeling quills hitting him, all bouncing off his heavily armored 
tank mode.
> 
> ---
> 
> Breakdown cursed as shots and quills dug into him, nearly tipping 
over him, 
> but his weight held him in place.  He turned, firing off an 
explosive shell 
> from his artillery mode at the Rodimus Prime look alike.
> 
> ---
> 
> Scavenger continued driving for the Ark, re-firing on Rodimus Prime 
with 25 
> shells from his machien guns, and three laser blasts from his laser 
cannon.
> 
> ---
> 
> Dark One made another pass, this time opening fire with 20 rapid 
laser blasts 
> down at Spears, laughing at how clever he was.
